pspricemessage.name: ./pspricemessage
pspricemessage.value: Final price may vary depending on the exchange amount

psinsurancetitle.name: ./psinsurancetitle
psinsurancetitle.value: Under the Motor Vehicle Act, 2019, it is compulsory for Indian vehicle owners to at least have a third-party liability insurance policy.

psinsurancedesc.name: ./psinsurancedesc
psinsurancedesc.value: You may wish to apply for insurance on your own. But, after purchase you will have to provide your insurance copy.

opthomesubtext.name: ./opthomesubtext
opthomesubtext.value: Get your VIDA delivered to your shipping address with a small fee starting from ₹100

psfpdisclaimer.name: ./psfpdisclaimer
psfpdisclaimer.value: Kindly finish this within 3-5 working days to ensure timely delivery.

psinfoBox.name: ./psinfoBox
psinfoBox.value: You are eligible for state subsidy. This amount will be refunded to your bank account within 10 business days.

pbsbillingaddressmessage.name: ./pbsbillingaddressmessage
pbsbillingaddressmessage.value: This address will be your RTO Address!

pbsshippingaddressmessage.name: ./pbsshippingaddressmessage
pbsshippingaddressmessage.value: We will check if your address is eligible for shipping, else you will need to pickup your vehicle from an experience centre.

pbsshippingaddresconfirm.name: ./pbsshippingaddresconfirm
pbsshippingaddresconfirm.value: Shipping address same as the billing adress

pbsnotificationbannerinfo.name: ./pbsnotificationbannerinfo
pbsnotificationbannerinfo.value: You will have to submit verification documents after payment ( Pasport size photo, Aadhar Card, Pan card, Address proof)Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.
